html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00502011-02-03,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Surface Coating Materials Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SURFACE COATING MATERIALS REGULATIONS, by adding Items 2 and 18 of Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act to them in order to continue regulating lead limits in surface coatings on furniture and other articles for children, pencils, and artists’ brushes under the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act, which comes into force on June 20, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0014 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Surface Coating Materials Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SURFACE COATING MATERIALS  REGULATIONS, by adding Items 2 and 18 of Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act to them in order to continue regulating lead limits in surface coatings on furniture and other articles for children, pencils, and artists’ brushes under the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act, which comes into force on June 20, 2011.
